---
title: "Kant Part II: Critique of the Power of Judgment"
subtitle: "Some Secondary Literature on Kant's Aesthetics"
---

Today we will look at some secondary literature on Kant's aesthetics, focusing on his "Critique of the Power of Judgment." We will explore how Kant differentiates between aesthetic and teleological judgments, and how these concepts relate to our understanding of beauty and purpose in nature.
